developer_experience.title: Create setup.sh for Local Development Onboarding
developer_experience.description: Develop a unified setup script that installs dependencies, configures environment variables, and initializes Docker containers for all services in the monorepo.
developer_experience.rationale: Currently, onboarding a new developer requires manual configuration across multiple services (Python, TypeScript, Go). A unified script reduces friction and ensures environment consistency.

developer_experience.title: Add 'claude-flow dev' Command
developer_experience.description: Extend the claude-flow CLI with a 'dev' command that starts all monorepo services in development mode with hot-reloading enabled.
developer_experience.rationale: Developers currently need to start multiple services manually in different terminals. A single CLI command improves workflow efficiency.
